Reviews.Title: “Great place for student groups”

Reviews.Content: stayed 30 students prague found staff accomodating price breakfast amazed people bent accomadate various allergies difficulties 30 teens bring appreciated location bus easily pick mornings walk curry sausage joints checkpoint charlie single traveler 30 avoid low tolerance noise squealing girls especially half term fun

Reviews.Title: “Absolute bargain at Euro 36 a night”
Reviews.Author: JohnnyAsbestos
Reviews.Content: pay hostel cost 36 euro night 6 beds clean tidy secure 6 beds 36 euro offered ideal family students business traveller coming financial car parking difficult ive stayed timers manged park outside ideally placed museum potsdammer platz 200 yards halles breakfast bit free school parties staying

Reviews.Title: “Says "hotel", but you get there and the sign says "HOSTEL".”
Reviews.Author: seputus
Reviews.Content: trying hotelhostel ranked poorly tripadvisor dump horrible service simply con people money maintaining air actual nonexistent quality looking photos websites worse real life bed barely adequate worn linen permanent stains add insult injury left scarf accident contacted hostel found yes helpfully offered send free address berlin coincidentally friend house berlin gladly address sent package dhl courier charged expense receiver friend pay €15 receive package travelled maybe 2 miles contacted hostel course received reply dont waste money

Reviews.Title: “Needs many improvements!”
Reviews.Author: suhruthu
Reviews.Content: positive excellent staff location easily walk sights check charlie ubahn station short walk direct bus m41 hauptbahnhof drop near hotel negative aspects terms comfort stay hotel performs terribly bad stayed 4 bed 5th floor night disturbed sound ubahn passing nearby hotel seriously sound proofing moreover curtains hard person height im 5 11 move cover windows effect light enter throughout night wouldnt recommend hotel unless looking damn cheap option stay berlin

Reviews.Title: “Best for students on a budget who want a good location”
Reviews.Author: vee91
Reviews.Content: kreuzberg berlin offers feel hotel hostel feel packed student tour world taking advantage value plain cant complain considering pay front desk helpful directions recommendations 5 min walk 2 nearby subway stations convenient 10 minute walk restaurants shopping biggest complaint excessively noisy tour resulting subpar sleep quality

Reviews.Title: “CHEAP AND COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION”
Reviews.Author: toffeeman79
Reviews.Content: wasnt expect stayed hostel type accommodation definitely exceeded expectations 13 staying 2 nights stag weekend arrived checked minimum fuss originally booked 4 3 4 single beds single reception offered cheaper option 3 triples 4 available needless impressed service 70 euros saved spent couple rounds drinks expect basic maintained separate toilets showers beds comfortable expected breakfast included quality continental breakfast plenty eat dont expect cooked breakfast option book else complimentary teacoffee reception free internet location quiet nice central sights walking distance taxis reasonable travelling definitely stay similar type holiday

Reviews.Title: “Incredible deal !!”
Reviews.Author: lancecampeau
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights 21 adults 4yr olden suite breakfast included excellent location clean friendly helpful mins nearest subway spelling plenty local resturants technology 5 min stay expecting ritz expecting hostel ready surprise

HotelInfo.Name: aletto Kreuzberg Youth Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Tempelhofer Ufer 8/9, 10963 Berlin, Germany
